user_input:
Modify the DHEM model.
  o	Get the datafile attribute for the Gas Pipeline Capacity data file for the PCIPMI infrastructure level (use crud pipeline)
  o	Create a variation of the Gas Pipeline Capacity data file for the PCIPMI infrastructure level by setting all values that aren't 0 to 999. Copy the H2\Gas.
  o	Add a scenario called unlimited_pci_pmi_pipeline_capacities
  o	Add a max flow property to each object in the H2 interconnection and H2 Internal bottleneck categories in the gas pipeline class, with the datafile and scenario created in the previous step
  o	Clone the model "DHEM_v41_2030_PCIPMI_1995" and add the new scenario. Call the model “DHEM_v41_2030_PCIPMI_1995_unlmtd_pipeline”
author: Dante
default_llm_context: Perform the specified operation based on the user's input and the PLEXOS model specifications.

tasks.description: Retrieve the datafile attribute for the Gas Pipeline Capacity data file for the PCIPMI infrastructure level using the CRUD pipeline.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's input, select the Gas Pipeline Capacity data file attribute for the PCIPMI infrastructure level.

function_args.user_input: Set all non-zero values to 999 and copy the H2\Gas file

tasks.description: Create a variation of the Gas Pipeline Capacity data file for the PCIPMI infrastructure level by setting all non-zero values to 999 and copying the H2\Gas file.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's input, select the file to modify.

tasks.description: Create a new scenario called 'unlimited_pci_pmi_pipeline_capacities' using the CRUD pipeline.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's input, determine the scenario creation context for unlimited_pci_pmi_pipeline_capacities.

tasks.description: Add a max flow property to each object in the H2 interconnection and H2 Internal bottleneck categories in the gas pipeline class, referencing the newly created datafile and scenario.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's input, determine the target objects for property update using the new datafile and scenario.

tasks.description: Clone the model 'DHEM_v41_2030_PCIPMI_1995' to create a new model named 'DHEM_v41_2030_PCIPMI_1995_unlmtd_pipeline' using the clone transfer pipeline.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's input, select the model to clone for creating the unlimited pipeline variant.

tasks.description: Add the new scenario 'unlimited_pci_pmi_pipeline_capacities' to the cloned model using the CRUD pipeline.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's input, select the cloned model and apply the new scenario.
